author: Nintendo of America
description:
Hello Kitty Island Adventure - Wheatflour Wonderland DLC is out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/hello-kitty-island-adventure-wheatflour-wonderland-70050000061002-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   

Cogimyun, a beloved new Sanrio character, is coming to Hello Kitty Island Adventure in the whimsical world of Wheatflour Wonderland. Craft powerful wands, discover the secrets of beautiful gemstones, and transform into your most magical self—or perhaps a super cute critter! 

#HelloKittyIslandAventure #HelloKitty #NintendoSwitch  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure – Wheatflour Wonderland DLC – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Start your season now in EA SPORTS FC 26 Ultimate Edition with up to 7 days of early access on #NintendoSwitch2 & #NintendoSwitch. Play now: https://ninten.do/6051sodI9 
 
The Club is Yours. Play your way with an overhauled gameplay experience powered by community feedback. Featuring the best players from the biggest clubs and competitions around the globe, experience The World's Game like never before! 
 
#EASPORTSFC26 #NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch
title: EA SPORTS FC 26 – Early Access Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
It’s here! Episode one of the Splatoon 3 North American League Show is available now!

Get an inside look at this exciting weekly Splatoon 3 tournament with this original show!

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. 
nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree is out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/towa-and-the-guardians-of-the-sacred-tree-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  


Enter a vibrant world filled with beauty and perilous danger. Forge weapons to slash through evil to protect the village and create bonds that stand the test of time.
